translation.en: -[horse whinnies] -[man 3] Watch where you're sodding going!
My name is Enola Holmes. You may remember me.
translation.es: Soy Enola Holmes. Quizá me recuerden.
Luego de resolver mi primer caso…

translation.en: Open and ready for my first clients.
I was going to join the pantheon of great Victorian detectives.
translation.es: Estaría a la altura de los grandes detectives victorianos.

translation.en: -[Enola] And the infamous Reginald Swain. -[Swain growls]
And best of all, I would be joining my brother.
translation.es: Lo mejor de todo, estaría a la altura de mi hermano.

translation.en: A detective in my own right,

translation.es: O eso fue lo que creí.
- ¿Cuántos años tienes? - Cielos, eres muy joven.

translation.en: -Stone the crows, you're young. -[Enola] My age is an advantage.
translation.es: - ¿Cuántos años tienes? - Cielos, eres muy joven. Mi edad es una ventaja.

translation.en: I can go to places others can't, explore where others won't.
translation.es: Voy adonde otros no llegan, exploro lo que otros no pueden.

translation.en: And I can fight. I know jujitsu.
But you're a girl. Yes, I am. Um…
translation.es: - Pero eres una chica. - Sí, así es.

translation.en: -The Tewkesbury case? -Well, that was Sherlock Holmes.
-Sherlock Holmes, wasn't it? -I assure you, it was mine.
translation.es: - Sherlock… - Sherlock Holmes, ¿no? Le aseguro que fui yo.

translation.en: Good man, that Tewkesbury. Brave lad.
translation.es: Tewkesbury es un buen muchacho. Muy valiente.

translation.en: Read all about it! Read all about it!
Sherlock Holmes and the case of the Brixton corpse.
translation.es: Sherlock Holmes y el caso del cadáver de Brixton.

translation.en: While I had not a single case, Sherlock has been drowning in them.
translation.es: Yo no tenía ni un solo caso y Sherlock no daba abasto.

translation.en: Though his latest appears to be vexing him.
translation.es: Aunque su caso más reciente parece irritarlo.

translation.en: My mother, meanwhile, is still on the run.
translation.es: Por otro lado, mi madre aún huye.

translation.en: And trying not to draw attention to herself.
[chuckles] Though that's never been her forte.
translation.es: Aunque jamás fue buena en eso. DERECHOS IGUALITARIOS PARA MUJERES

translation.en: [Enola] Yes, and then there is… him.
[Tewkesbury] My lords, reform is not a task to be accomplished,
translation.es: Lores, la reforma no es una tarea a cumplir

translation.en: nor a bill that can be passed.
translation.es: ni un proyecto de ley a aprobar,

translation.en: Rather it is a constant need for change.
translation.es: sino una necesidad constante de cambio.

translation.en: [Enola] Lord Tewkesbury, the champion of change and progress.
translation.es: Lord Tewkesbury, el defensor del cambio y el progreso.

translation.en: A man to approach with the noblest cause.
translation.es: Un hombre que atiende las causas más nobles.

translation.en: [Enola] But I had no time for distractions. And besides, he's still a nincompoop.
translation.es: Pero no tenía tiempo para distracciones. Además, aún es un tonto.

translation.en: [Eudoria] Too many people make it their sole purpose in life
translation.es: El único objetivo de muchas personas

translation.en: to fit into the world around them.
translation.es: es encajar en el mundo que los rodea.

translation.en: But no matter how lost you feel,
translation.es: Pero, sin importar cuán perdida te sientas,

translation.en: if you stay true to yourself,
translation.es: si te mantienes fiel a quien eres,

translation.en: the path will always find you again.
translation.es: el camino siempre te volverá a hallar.

translation.en: [Enola] But my path, it seemed, had come to an end.
translation.es: Pero parecía que mi camino había llegado a su fin.

translation.en: All I could do now was go home.
I've come to the right place then.
Is it true you find lost people?
Where did you get this? It's months old.
translation.es: ¿De dónde sacaste esto? Es de hace meses.

translation.en: I found it on the street.
Everyone says she's run away, but Sarah wouldn't do that,
translation.es: Todos dicen que huyó, pero Sarah no huiría.

translation.en: The other girls are still at work.
We're lucky. Most girls here are five to a room.
translation.es: Tenemos suerte. Suele haber cinco chicas por cuarto.

translation.en: Oh. Sarah likes to leave cheese out for 'em.
translation.es: A Sarah le gusta dejarles queso.

translation.en: What does she look like, Sarah?
We weren't sisters in the usual way.
She looks like she'll blow over in the wind.
translation.es: Parece que la volará el viento.

translation.en: [Enola] So, Bessie, what was Sarah wearing the day she disappeared?
translation.es: Bessie, ¿qué llevaba puesto Sarah el día que desapareció?

translation.en: It was her other dress, the green one.
translation.es: Llevaba su otro vestido, el verde.

translation.en: Sarah said you had to learn about the world if you're gonna live in it.
translation.es: Dice que debes aprender sobre el mundo para habitarlo.

translation.en: Did she have a suitor? [Bessie] Nah. But there's plenty have taken an interest.
translation.es: - ¿Tenía un pretendiente? - No, pero muchos lo intentaron.

translation.en: She weren't much of a gardener.
Look, how about you quit sniffing round?
translation.es: Escucha, ¿qué tal si dejas de husmear?

translation.en: [Bessie] Quiet, Mae! Just let her do her job.
The 12th of March. Does that date mean anything to you?
translation.es: "Mar". ¿El 12 de marzo? ¿Esa fecha te dice algo?

translation.en: We don't need help from people like you.
translation.es: No necesitamos ayuda de gente como tú.

translation.en: I found her, so she's staying.
translation.es: Yo la encontré. No se irá.

translation.en: -[Mae] Bloody girls poking their nose in. -[Enola chuckles]
-And she didn't leave a note? -Just this.
She worked two jobs, you see. We couldn't get by without it.
translation.es: Tenía dos trabajos. Solo así podíamos sobrevivir.

translation.en: Some place called The Stag Antlers.
translation.es: Un lugar llamado The Stag Antlers.

translation.en: Oh. No, it's all right. We'll figure that out later.
translation.es: No, está bien. Luego arreglaremos eso.

translation.en: So tell me, when was the last time you saw her?
translation.es: Dime, ¿cuándo la viste por última vez?

translation.en: A week ago, at the match factory.
translation.es: Hace una semana en la fábrica de fósforos.

translation.en: She had a fight with Mr. Crouch, the foreman, in his office.
translation.es: Discutió con el señor Crouch, el capataz, en su oficina.

translation.en: The match factory, is that where she works?
Where we all work. We're match girls, ain't we?
-Then that's where we'll start. -So you'll take it? You'll take the case?
translation.es: Comenzaremos allí. Entonces, ¿lo acepta? ¿Acepta el caso?

translation.en: I shall find you, Sarah Chapman.
Red hair, green dress, makeup, science books, 12th March.
translation.es: Pelirroja, vestido verde. Maquillaje. Libros de ciencia. 12 de marzo.
Sea lo que sea que hagas…

translation.en: [Bessie] Stay with me. Follow my way.
-[Enola] How many girls work here? -[Bessie] Five hundred, maybe six.
-Is my neckerchief all right? -Oh, well, it's around your neck.
translation.es: - ¿Tengo el pañuelo bien? - Lo tiene alrededor del cuello.

translation.en: -[girl] Please, Mr. Crouch. -[Crouch] I said, out.
[Crouch] Oi, new girl. Name in the register.
translation.es: Oye, chica nueva. Anota tu nombre en el registro.

translation.en: Don't worry, you get used to the smell.
Put the matches on the comb…
That is a penny off your wages.
[Bessie] She's just learning the way, Mr. Crouch.
[Crouch] She better learn quicker, or it's a penny off yours too.
translation.es: Que aprenda rápido o te descontaré a ti también.

translation.en: Anyone else want a money dock?
I need to get up into that office.
[Eudoria] All it takes is one small thing
translation.es: No se necesita más que algo pequeño

translation.en: to change the rules of the world.
translation.es: para cambiar las reglas del mundo.

translation.en: How did that bloody happen, eh?
Oi, pick 'em up. Pick 'em up, pick 'em up.
Don't you look at me like that, girl.
[man] Charles! This is not what I was expecting when we made our arrangement.
-My pockets are empty. -You think mine full?
translation.es: - No tengo dinero. - ¿Cree que soy rico?

translation.en: You gave me your word you'd find whoever was doing this to us.
translation.es: Me prometió que hallaría al responsable.

translation.en: You sound almost threatening, Mr. Lyon.
translation.es: Casi suena como una amenaza, señor Lyon.

translation.en: This is not what I expected when we began our arrangement.
translation.es: Esto no es lo que esperaba cuando hicimos nuestro acuerdo.

translation.en: And now theft, on top of everything else.
translation.es: Y ahora se suma un robo.

translation.en: -You heard the man. Get this dealt with. -[Mr. Lyon] Come along, William.
translation.es: - Ya lo oyó. Resuélvalo. - Vamos, William.

translation.en: [woman] Sir, do you have any suspicions as to who this perpetrator might be?
translation.es: Señor, ¿tiene alguna sospecha de quién podría ser el ladrón?

translation.en: [Charles] Would I be asking you if I did?
translation.es: ¿Cree que se lo diría si la tuviera?

translation.en: But, sir, perhaps if we were to consider whether this theft is connected.
translation.es: Pero, señor, quizá deberíamos considerar si este robo está relacionado.

translation.en: -I have ideas-- -Did I ask for your advice?
Or did I simply tell you to get it done?
translation.es: ¿O solo le dije que lo resolviera?

translation.en: I'll make sure the right people know, sir.
translation.es: Se lo diré a la gente indicada.

translation.en: Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.es: Las damas trabajan al mayor ritmo de producción y eficiencia.

translation.en: -[Mr. Lyon] Please, if you will… -[foreboding music plays]
Doris, how are you? How's your sister? Is she, um, still unwell?
translation.es: Doris, ¿cómo estás? ¿Cómo está tu hermana? ¿Sigue enferma?

translation.en: Really is the plague of our time.
Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.es: Lleva dos años matando a estas chicas.

translation.en: Well, Lord McIntyre, if I might suggest a little lunch. I think we've earned it.
translation.es: Bueno, lord McIntyre, ¿qué le parece si almorzamos? Nos lo merecemos.

translation.en: [Enola] How did Sarah do it? Get into the office?
translation.es: ¿Cómo hizo Sarah para entrar a la oficina?

translation.en: There was a fire at one of the stations. Foreman got distracted.
translation.es: Hubo un incendio en una de las estaciones. El capataz se distrajo.

translation.en: You're a good detective, Enola Holmes.
[Enola] Everyone thinks detecting is a profession littered with rules,
translation.es: Todos creen que hay mil reglas para ser detective,

translation.en: but in truth, there's only one.
translation.es: pero en realidad, solo hay una.

translation.en: Pull on every loose thread you find.
translation.es: Jala cada cabo suelto que encuentres.

translation.en: -What a pleasant evening. -Young lady, I'm afraid I'm married.
translation.es: Hola, señor. Qué noche tan agradable. Jovencita, me temo que estoy casado.

translation.en: That's tuppence for a sweet, cheating face like yours.
translation.es: Dos peniques para una chica tan dulce y tramposa.

translation.en: -Genuine toffee. -[man] Out of my way, girl.
♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
translation.es: ¿Dónde obtuviste ese sombrero? ¿Dónde obtuviste ese bombín?

translation.en: ♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
translation.es: Es de mi agrado. Es muy refinado.

translation.en: ♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
translation.es: Uno igual es todo lo que quiero.

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.es: Oigo siempre sin esmero: "¿Dónde obtuviste ese sombrero?".

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.es: Oigo siempre sin esmero: "¿Dónde obtuviste ese sombrero?".

translation.en: ♪ Where did you get that hat? Where did you get that tile? ♪
translation.es: ¿Dónde obtuviste ese sombrero? ¿Dónde obtuviste ese bombín?

translation.en: ♪ Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style? ♪
translation.es: Es de mi agrado. Es muy refinado.

translation.en: ♪ I should like to have one Just the same as that ♪
translation.es: Uno igual es todo lo que quiero.

translation.en: ♪ Where'er I go, they shout "Hello, where did you get that hat?" ♪
translation.es: Oigo siempre sin esmero: "¿Dónde obtuviste ese sombrero?".

translation.en: [announcer] And now, all the way from Shanghai,
Mr. Li and his world of illusions!
translation.es: el señor Lee y su mundo de ilusiones.

translation.en: You the foozler who took my pan stick?
Um, no. I'm looking for a girl called M--
translation.es: No, busco a una chica llamada M…

translation.en: She worked two jobs, you see.
Some place called The Stag Antlers.
translation.es: Un lugar llamado The Stag Antlers.

translation.en: You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.es: Tienes un segundo para decirme qué haces aquí.

translation.en: She did, didn't she? And Bessie doesn't know.
translation.es: Trabajaba aquí, ¿no? Y Bessie no lo sabe.

translation.en: There's plenty Bessie don't know. And plenty you don't need to tell her.
translation.es: Hay mucho que no sabe y mucho que no debes decirle.

translation.en: I know you helped her into that office. She took those pages. Why?
translation.es: Sé que la ayudaste a entrar a la oficina. ¿Por qué tomó esas páginas?

translation.en: -What's happened to her? -Just leave us be, all right?
Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.es: Esta pelea no es para chicas elegantes.

translation.en: Posh or not, one thing I am good at is fighting.
translation.es: Elegante o no, sé pelear muy bien.

translation.en: Now tell me, where is she hiding and what does she know?
translation.es: Ahora dime, ¿dónde se esconde y qué sabe?

translation.en: You got more to you than I thought.
translation.es: Eres mejor de lo que pensé.

translation.en: [clears throat] Whatever this is, Mae is on stage in 30 ticks,
translation.es: No sé qué sucede, pero Mae sube al escenario en 30 segundos

translation.en: and she's still dressed as a gent.
So let go of her, now.
-Get her out of here. -[man] Be my pleasure.
Where did Sarah Chapman do her makeup?
[man] Full of secrets that one, and not a bad actress.
translation.es: Esa está llena de secretos y no es mala actriz.

translation.en: I'd have given her the boot if she weren't so good, but she did attract the men with big pockets.
translation.es: La habría echado si no fuera tan buena, pero atraía a los hombres ricos.

translation.en: There was this one gent, society type, and he came regular.
translation.es: Había un caballero de la alta sociedad que venía seguido.

translation.en: Very keen on him she was. He'd send flowers, letters.
translation.es: A ella le gustaba mucho. Él le enviaba flores y cartas.

translation.en: [chuckles] You see, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.es: Todas creen que hay esperanza de que les llegará el amor.

translation.en: Blokes like that, they want cheap,
"As we two ate of the fruit of love…"
"A bell did ring in the sky above"
"So wander that place With its blossoms white"
"A chapel awaits us out of sight"
translation.es: La capilla nos aguarda sin observadores".

translation.en: Did she run away with this fellow?
Or is she running from him?
I hope it's the latter. His poetry is extremely bad.
translation.es: Ojalá eso último. Ese poema es horrendo.

translation.en: What are you doing here? It's not safe.
-Yes, let me know when you meet one. -[Sherlock sighs drunkenly]
It was just a disagreement over a glass of wine
translation.es: Fue solo un altercado sobre una copa de vino

translation.en: I find after wine, it's very difficult to make your arms and legs move.
translation.es: al parecer es muy difícil moverse luego de beber vino.

translation.en: I don't usually imbibe, but I'm on a case, you see.
translation.es: No suelo beber, pero trabajo en un caso.

translation.en: -[Sherlock] Where are we going? -221 Baker Street.
[Enola] As it turns out, my brother is medievally heavy.
translation.es: Al parecer, mi hermano es medievalmente pesado.

translation.en: It's like carrying a dead horse on which sits another dead horse.
translation.es: Es como cargar un caballo muerto sobre otro caballo muerto.
Ese es el A. Yo vivo en el B.

translation.en: I didn't know you had steps.
One should always have steps to avoid people stepping on you.
translation.es: Siempre se necesitan escaleras para evitar que te pisen.

translation.en: That's a tip. You should probably write that down.
[sighs] All right. Lift your right leg.
Better leg, the left. You should write that down.
translation.es: La pierna izquierda es mejor. Deberías anotarlo.

translation.en: -Oh, but it's such a mess. -It's perfect. Don't touch anything.
translation.es: - ¡Qué desorden! - Está perfecto. No toques nada.

translation.en: [Sherlock] None of your business. I work alone. It's private.
translation.es: No te incumbe. Trabajo solo. Es privado.

translation.en: Now shh, I'm thinking. One should never be interrupted when thinking.
translation.es: Cállate, estoy pensando. No interrumpas a alguien cuando piensa.

translation.en: And why, pray, have you moved everything?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué, santos cielos, moviste todo?

translation.en: -Nothing looks different to me. -Nothing looks different? Ev--
translation.es: - No veo nada diferente. - ¿No ves nada diferente? Tod…

translation.en: Your head is sore? I can't think why.
[Sherlock] This is why I don't have people in my rooms.
translation.es: Por eso nunca invito a nadie.

translation.en: Look what you've done. My papers are entirely out of order.
translation.es: Mira lo que hiciste. Desordenaste todos mis papeles.

translation.en: Seems to be an awful lot of question marks on that map of yours.
translation.es: Hay muchos signos de interrogación en tu mapa.

translation.en: -I will see you again. -Is that why you're drinking?
I'm more than certain… [sniffs] …it's not so old.
translation.es: Estoy más que seguro de que no es muy viejo.

translation.en: -Maybe I can help. -You can help by leaving.
translation.es: - Quizá pueda ayudar. - Ayudarás si te vas.

translation.en: Huh. Yes. The world will be a much safer place
translation.es: Sí. El mundo sería mucho más seguro

translation.en: if we don't see the inside of Sherlock Holmes, only the out.
translation.es: si no viéramos el interior de Sherlock Holmes, solo su exterior.

translation.en: Have you ever considered a flatmate?
-For what purpose? -To stop you descending into this.
translation.es: - ¿Para qué? - Para evitar que caigas en esto.

translation.en: Strange how those seeking advice so often like to dispense it.
translation.es: Es curioso que suelen dar consejos aquellos que más los necesitan.

translation.en: Did I ask for advice? I found you on the street, drunk.
translation.es: ¿Te pedí un consejo? - Te hallé ebrio en la calle. - ¿Qué puedo observar de ti?

translation.en: -Now what may I observe about you? -We're not playing this game.
translation.es: - Te hallé ebrio en la calle. - ¿Qué puedo observar de ti? - No jugaré. - Mal calzado. Cabello despeinado.

translation.en: Shoes a state. Hair's not much better.
translation.es: - No jugaré. - Mal calzado. Cabello despeinado.

translation.en: -You and Mycroft are so similar. -You need to wash your clothes.
translation.es: - Eres igual a Mycroft. - Debes lavar tu ropa.
- No ves más allá… - Pálida, desnutrida…

translation.en: -Why are you working in a match factory? -What?
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces en una fábrica de fósforos? - ¿Qué?

translation.en: Last night, they were dirty with green traces. This morning, they are black.
translation.es: Anoche tenían marcas verdes y esta mañana están negras.

translation.en: The phosphorous from the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
translation.es: Es la mezcla del fósforo con el oxígeno.

translation.en: I wasn't in such a state as to not see that.
translation.es: No estaba tan mal como para no notarlo.

translation.en: -How did you-- -[Sherlock] And your neck is red.
Someone has gripped it or held a knife against…
translation.es: Alguien lo agarró o puso un cuchillo en…

translation.en: Are you involved in something dangerous?
If you need my help, my offer remains on the table.
translation.es: Si necesitas mi ayuda, mi oferta sigue en pie.

translation.en: Don't be so desperate to prove yourself, Enola.
translation.es: No te desesperes por demostrar tu valor.

translation.en: I am not desperate, and I don't need your or anyone's help.
translation.es: No estoy desesperada ni necesito tu ayuda ni la de nadie.

translation.en: [Enola] How dare he? How dare he lecture me?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se atreve? ¿Cómo se atreve a sermonearme?

translation.en: When he can't even solve his own case
and he lives in a bed of flummoxing papers and bewildering mold.
translation.es: y vive en una montaña exorbitante de papeles y moho.

translation.en: How dare he claim I'm desperate? It is not true.
translation.es: ¿Cómo se atreve a decirme desesperada? No es cierto.

translation.en: I'm on a case. Undercover. Forget I told you that piece of information.
translation.es: Trabajo en un caso. Encubierta. Aunque olvida que lo dije.

translation.en: It's the strangest thing. I could have sworn I've seen you here before.
translation.es: Es muy curioso, podría jurar haberte visto aquí antes.

translation.en: Well, this is my… My route through to the Lords.
translation.es: Este es el camino que tomo a la Cámara de los Lores.

translation.en: Well, I… I breakfast here on occasion.
I mean, yes, it's a lovely place. I-I know the gardener here.
translation.es: Es decir, sí, es un lugar encantador. Conozco al jardinero.

translation.en: We've been discussing what to sow for next year's crop.
translation.es: Hablamos de qué sembrar el próximo año.

translation.en: Uh, Sweet Williams, for their lovely vivid reds.
translation.es: El clavel Sweet William por su bello rojo.

translation.en: You are quite the eligible bachelor.

translation.es: No creas todo lo que lees.

translation.en: Starting my own business. A perpetual challenge.
translation.es: Comencé mi propio negocio. Un desafío perpetuo.

translation.en: -Well, Enola, if you need help-- -I do not.
Should my problem become horticultural, I shall seek you out.
translation.es: Te buscaré si mi problema se torna hortícola.

translation.en: Well, you know where to find me
I hope you enjoy your breakfast.
[in normal voice] Oh. Good, he isn't.
I don't come here every day.
Just on days when I feel a need.
And sometimes he doesn't take this path. Sometimes he takes the parallel one.
translation.es: Y a veces no toma este camino. A veces toma el paralelo.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[echoing] You know where to find me.
"The chapel awaits us With its blossoms white"
"As we two ate of the fruit of love"
"A bell did ring in the sky above"
The game has found its feet again.
There is a certain satisfaction that you feel as a detective
when your case comes closer to resolution.
translation.es: cuando te acercas a resolver el caso.

translation.en: …which I don't do, or teaching a dog to sit.
translation.es: que no hago, o enseñarle a un perro a sentarse.

translation.en: You begin to glow with the acknowledgement of a job well done.
translation.es: Resplandeces con el brillo de un trabajo bien hecho.

translation.en: [boy] There's a new Holmes in town.
translation.es: Una nueva Holmes en la ciudad.

translation.en: That's right. Sherlock Holmes has met his match.
translation.es: Así es. Sherlock Holmes tiene competencia.

translation.en: My name will be known, and Bessie will have a sister once again.
translation.es: Todos conocerán mi nombre y Bessie recuperará a su hermana.

translation.en: And that is a job well…
translation.es: Y ese es un trabajo bien…

translation.en: What happened? Who did this to you?
-Was it him, Sarah's man? Mae! -[tense music continues]
I'll fetch a doctor for you.
Oh, no, no, no. I'm investigating a case. A disappearance of a girl.
translation.es: No, estoy investigando un caso. Desapareció una chica.

translation.en: -What, that girl? -No. No, no, no. H-Her name is Mae.
translation.es: - ¿Ella? - No. No, ella se llama Mae.

translation.en: She worked at the Paragon Theater, the matchstick factory.
translation.es: Trabajaba en The Paragon Theater y la fábrica de fósforos.

translation.en: I was sent to investigate a possible disturbance.
translation.es: Me enviaron por un posible disturbio.

translation.en: Someone heard some screams, and then I discovered this young lady.
translation.es: Alguien oyó unos gritos y luego descubrí a esta joven.

translation.en: Uh, his sister. A detective too.
[sighs] Good God, another one. Shouldn't you be in finishing school?
translation.es: Santos cielos, otro más. Deberías estar en la escuela de modales.

translation.en: Sarah Chapman? Well, well, how intriguing. So am I.

translation.es: - Se la busca por robo y chantaje. - ¿Chantaje?
Aún está tibia. Sin rigor mortis.

translation.en: -When were the screams heard, inspector? -Ten past the hour, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo oyeron los gritos? - A las y diez, señor.

translation.en: Uh, no, I was trying to suppress the blood. I-I was trying to save her.
translation.es: No, intentaba detener la hemorragia. Intentaba salvarla.

translation.en: Or trying to get information out of her.
Oh, I couldn't. I can't pat her down, sir.
translation.es: No puedo. No puedo registrarla, señor.

translation.en: Come along, Lestrade. Let's not be coy about this.
-She's a detective. She knows the rules. -[Lestrade] Yes.
translation.es: Ella es detective. - Conoce las reglas. - Sí.

translation.en: Then why are you hiding it?
Found at a murder scene with a freshly dead corpse,
translation.es: Estabas en la escena del crimen con un cadáver aún tibio.

translation.en: harboring evidence isn't gonna look good.
That young ladies don't have the hands for killing?
-Go on! -[Grail] After her, all of ya!
Why ever would she ever do that?
-[policeman] Get out of the way! Move! -[woman shrieks]
Ah. Lestrade of Scotland Yard. You remember me, I hope.
translation.es: Lestrade de Scotland Yard. Me recuerda. Eso espero.

translation.en: We're looking for your sister. She's caused a bit of trouble.
translation.es: Buscamos a su hermana. Ha causado algunos problemas.

translation.en: That I do not have two of.
Perhaps you can explain what you believe Enola has done.
translation.es: Quizá pueda explicar lo que cree que hizo Enola.

translation.en: I wish I was at liberty to say, sir.
Don't tell me it's a Clerkenwell.
What evidence do they have against my sister?
Perhaps, uh, you tell me yours and I'll tell you mine.
translation.es: Si me dice su caso, le diré el mío.
Es del gobierno, robo de dinero.

translation.en: Or may I call you Sherlock?
My father thought it distinguished, and it is rather.
translation.es: Mi padre lo creía un nombre distinguido y en verdad lo es.

translation.en: [Lestrade] Well, anyway, should you ever wish to call me that…
translation.es: En fin, si alguna vez desea llamarme así…

translation.en: My mistake. I should have warned you I was opening it.
translation.es: Lo siento. Debí advertirte que iba a abrirlo.

translation.en: "You tell me yours and I'll tell you mine."
translation.es: "Si me dice su caso, le diré el mío".

translation.en: He's a ninny. I needed to know what he had on you.
translation.es: Es un bufón. Quería saber qué tenía contra ti.

translation.en: Money. Unaccounted transfers going in and out of government offices.
translation.es: Transferencias inexplicables de oficinas del gobierno.

translation.en: My theory is either bribery, extortion, or blackmail.
translation.es: Mi teoría es soborno, extorsión o chantaje.

translation.en: Separate filings from five different accounts
going via the Treasury into one private bank.
translation.es: que pasan por el Tesoro a un banco privado.

translation.en: -So someone is getting rich from this? -Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Alguien se vuelve rico con esto? - Sí.

translation.en: I visited the bank and inquired. The money disappeared,
translation.es: Fui al banco y consulté. El dinero desapareció, fue a otro banco y luego a otro,

translation.en: arriving at another bank, and then another,
translation.es: El dinero desapareció, fue a otro banco y luego a otro,

translation.en: and another, and another, and another, and another.
translation.es: y otro, y otro, y otro y otro.

translation.en: Every one of them hidden using different account numbers.
translation.es: Cada una de ellas ocultas con números de cuenta diferentes.

translation.en: -Well, what can you deduce from that? -Three things.
Firstly, the man's a game player, perhaps a genius in mathematics,
translation.es: Primero: el hombre es un jugador, quizá un genio en matemáticas,

translation.en: capable of covering his traces at every turn.
translation.es: capaz de cubrir todas sus huellas.

translation.en: Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.es: Cinco bancos, al sur del río, pero sin un nexo aparente.
Y todo va a parar a un solo bolsillo.

translation.en: Every time I pull a thread, it loosens, vanishes,
translation.es: Cada vez que jalo un cabo, se afloja, desaparece

translation.en: reappears somewhere else. He's leading me a merry dance.
translation.es: y reaparece en otro lado. Me hace bailar en círculos. Es…
Me hace bailar en círculos. Es…

translation.en: One. A week before the first transfer,
translation.es: Una. Días antes de la primera transferencia,

translation.en: there was a break-in at the Treasury office by a man in a taper crown hat.
translation.es: un hombre con sombrero irrumpió al Tesoro.
- ¿Qué robó? - Un documento. No sé de qué.

translation.en: They won't talk about it. Sensitive information presumably.
translation.es: - ¿Qué robó? - Un documento. No sé de qué. Debe tener datos importantes.

translation.en: But how it connects to all of this has so far eluded me.
translation.es: Pero hasta ahora no logro comprender cómo se conecta con todo esto.

translation.en: Your turn. I hope the blood's not yours.
translation.es: Ahora tú. Espero que no sea tu sangre.

translation.en: I'm looking for a girl, Sarah Chapman.
translation.es: Busco a una chica. Sarah Chapman.

translation.en: She worked at Lyons match factory by day, and the music hall at night.
translation.es: Trabajaba en la fábrica de fósforos y en el music hall.

translation.en: And there I found her friend,
translation.es: Y ahí encontré a su amiga…

translation.en: And who killed her? This poppy fellow?
Perhaps he kidnapped Sarah and her friend discovered it.
translation.es: Quizá secuestró a Sarah y su amiga lo descubrió.

translation.en: I found more evidence on her.
It's as bad as the poem.
translation.es: Es tan malo como el poema.

translation.en: Grail said she had stolen something and that she was blackmailing them.
translation.es: Grail dijo que había robado algo y que los chantajeaba.

translation.en: -Though Sarah wouldn't do that. -You don't know this person.
translation.es: - Pero Sarah no lo haría. - ¿Cómo sabes? No la conoces.

translation.en: You came here running from the police.
and you are now a suspect in a murder case.
You've let your emotions get the better of you.
translation.es: Te dejaste llevar por tus emociones.

translation.en: Stay here. Don't leave. I will look into this.
translation.es: Quédate aquí. No te vayas. Yo investigaré esto.

translation.en: But Sarah Chapman is my responsibility. No one else cares for these girls.
translation.es: Ella es mi responsabilidad. Nadie se preocupa por estas chicas.
Se lo juré a su hermana.

translation.en: The first mistake a detective makes is to make it about themselves and not the case.
translation.es: El primer error que comete un detective es centrarse en ellos y no en el caso.

translation.en: Enola, I know you're not a fan of unnecessary advice,
translation.es: Enola, sé que no te gustan los consejos innecesarios,

translation.en: I should probably write that down.
[girl] Matches, matches! Come buy your matches!
Matches, matches! Only a penny a box.
[Mae] Posh girls like you don't belong in this fight.
translation.es: Esta pelea no es para chicas elegantes.

translation.en: We don't need help from people like you.
translation.es: No necesitamos ayuda de gente como tú.

translation.en: [man] See, they all think there's hope. That love is coming their way.
translation.es: Todas creen que hay esperanza de que les llegará el amor.

translation.en: Gents like that, they want cheap, but they marry dear.
translation.es: Los caballeros así quieren mujerzuelas, pero se casan con damas.

translation.en: [Enola] So, Poppy, you're a gent, are you?
And a well-heeled one to afford a love nest like that.
translation.es: Y adinerado para pagar un nido de amor así.

translation.en: [Sherlock] There was a break-in at the Treasury office by a man in a taper crown hat.
translation.es: Días antes de la primera transferencia, un hombre con sombrero irrumpió al Tesoro.

translation.en: Five banks, south of the river, but no clear link between them.
translation.es: Cinco bancos, al sur del río, pero sin un nexo aparente.

translation.en: "Hosted by Henry and Hilda Lyon. 12 Marchmont Square."
translation.es: Organizado por Henry e Hilda Lyon. 12 Marchmont Square".

translation.en: Does that date mean anything to you?
It's not a date at all.
"Their eldest son, William Lyon, will be leading the first…"
translation.es: "Su hijo mayor, William Lyon, hará el primer…".

translation.en: Sweet Williams, for their wonderfully vivid reds.
translation.es: El clavel Sweet William por su bello rojo.

translation.en: Our ladies are working at the highest level of production and efficiency.
translation.es: Las damas trabajan al mayor ritmo de producción y eficiencia.

translation.en: And all along, I thought you were a poppy.
translation.es: Siempre creí que eras una amapola.

translation.en: Let's see how sweet you are, Sweet William.
translation.es: Veamos quién eres realmente, Sweet William.

translation.en: Which, when you're wanted by the police, is most useful.
translation.es: Algo muy útil si te busca la policía.

translation.en: [man] Pray silence for his Lordship Viscount McIntyre.
translation.es: Hagan silencio para el lord vizconde McIntyre.

translation.en: I-I'm sorry to break apart this glorious occasion,
Any chance to stand on a stage, I'll always take it.
translation.es: Siempre aprovecho la oportunidad de hablar en público.

translation.en: [Charles McIntyre] And I must speak to thank our host
translation.es: Y debo hacerlo para agradecer al anfitrión

translation.en: For Henry Lyon turns all before him into gold.
translation.es: Porque Henry Lyon convierte todo lo que toca en oro.

translation.en: What he has done with matches is legendary.
translation.es: Lo que logró con los fósforos es legendario.

translation.en: In two years, he's turned red into black.
translation.es: En dos años, pasó del rojo al negro.

translation.en: Or should I say, red into white?
translation.es: O, mejor dicho, del rojo al blanco.

translation.en: And to have this humble man turn his attention to typhoid and the working poor,
translation.es: Este humilde hombre les presta atención al tifus y a los trabajadores pobres,

translation.en: raising funds, diagnosing cases in the community,
translation.es: reúne fondos y diagnostica casos en la comunidad.
Me deja sin habla. Realmente sin habla.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Henry Lyon.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, un brindis por Henry Lyon.

translation.en: And to his fine son, his heir, William.
translation.es: Y por su gran hijo, su heredero, William.

translation.en: -[all] To the future. -[McIntyre] May it ever be bright.
translation.es: Por el futuro. Que sea muy brillante.

translation.en: I believe I've seen that dress somewhere before.
translation.es: Creo que vi ese vestido antes.

translation.en: This is a wonderful occasion, is it not?
translation.es: Es un maravilloso evento, ¿no es así?

translation.en: I mean, the guests are just… delightful.
And the orchestra is most tuneful.
translation.es: Y la orquesta es muy melodiosa.

translation.en: I might be able to speak to you, Mr. Lyon.
translation.es: si pudiese hablar con usted, señor Lyon.

translation.en: -Uh, have I said something wrong? -Where is your chaperone?
My dear, you can hardly expect my son to talk to you unaccompanied.
translation.es: Querida, no esperarás que mi hijo te hable sin compañía.

translation.en: I cannot talk to you without a chaperone?
translation.es: ¿No puedo hablar con usted sin una chaperona?

translation.en: It could be claimed, with some justification, that I might have prepared more thoroughly.
translation.es: Se podría indicar, con cierta veracidad, que no me preparé debidamente.

translation.en: But dancing is not one of my core strengths.
translation.es: Pero el baile no es una de mis fortalezas.

translation.en: ♪ Knees up Mother Brown Under the table you must go ♪
translation.es: Levanta las rodillas y ve por debajo de la mesa.

translation.en: [Sherlock] The man's a game player. Separate filings from five different accounts.
translation.es: El hombre es un jugador. Transferencias de cinco cuentas.

translation.en: Capable of covering his traces at every turn. One private bank.
translation.es: Capaz de cubrir todas sus huellas. Un banco privado.

translation.en: Vanishes and reappears. No name. Just a number.
translation.es: Desaparece y reaparece. No tengo un nombre. Solo un número.

translation.en: [Sherlock] Yes. The Language of the Dance.
translation.es: Sí. El idioma de la danza.

translation.en: I feel I recognize you from somewhere.
translation.es: Tengo la sensación de que te conozco de algún sitio.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] I simply have one of those faces.
translation.es: Solo tengo un rostro muy común.

translation.en: You mustn't let them concern you.
Everyone here is playing a part.
What are they doing with those fans?

translation.es: Dicen todo lo que está prohibido

translation.en: or too embarrassing to say aloud.
translation.es: o todo lo que es muy vergonzoso para decir en voz alta.

translation.en: Without power, we women must rely on our wits for our fortune,
translation.es: Sin poder, las mujeres debemos confiar en nuestro ingenio

translation.en: because our chances are short. Here.
I have no use for it.
And if you wish to speak to William,
translation.es: Y si quieres hablar con William…

translation.en: you could always try with that.
No, not… No, not you. Oh.
Really, there's no need to be rude.
translation.es: No hay necesidad de ser grosera.

translation.en: Don't speak to me here, otherwise you'll be thrown onto the street.
translation.es: No me hables aquí o te arrojarán a la calle.

translation.en: -I need you to teach me to dance. -Teach you to dance? When?
translation.es: - Necesito que me enseñes a bailar. - ¿Qué? ¿Cuándo?

translation.en: You understand I've been learning since I was five?
translation.es: Aprendo a bailar desde los cinco años.

translation.en: Good. I'd feared you'd be a terrible teacher.
translation.es: Bien. Temía que fueras un pésimo maestro.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I'm looking for a murderer.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces aquí? Busco a un asesino.

translation.en: Though I shouldn't have told you. Forget I told you that.
-I'm trying to save a girl's life. -Through dance?
translation.es: - Intento salvarle la vida a una chica. - ¿A través de la danza?

translation.en: All right. Hold your back straight.
translation.es: Está bien. Pon la espalda erguida.

translation.en: And I'll place my hand here and here.
Now, I will lead and you will follow.
translation.es: Ahora yo guiaré y tú seguirás.

translation.en: -That seems like a mistake. -Face over my shoulder.
translation.es: - Ya no me agrada. - Cabeza sobre mi hombro.

translation.en: Two, three. Two, three. Four, two, three. One, two, three. Two, three.
You seem different since last we spoke.
translation.es: Luces diferente de la última vez.

translation.en: Tell me why you've been coming to the park.
translation.es: Dime por qué vas al parque.

translation.en: Why… Why watch me walk to the Lords?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me ves ir a la Cámara?

translation.en: Simply keeping an eye on you,
in case you get yourself into any more scrapes.
translation.es: por si te metes en más aprietos.
- Como que te arrojen de trenes… - Enola…

translation.en: You cannot be trusted to take care of yourself.
translation.es: No confío en que te cuides solo.

translation.en: You're a man when I tell you you're a man.
translation.es: Lo serás cuando yo lo diga.

translation.en: And the scrapes I find myself in are far less visceral.
translation.es: Los aprietos en los que me meto yo son menos sangrientos.

translation.en: Dancing is a trust, it's a union. That's why I've always loved it,
translation.es: La danza implica una unión, por eso siempre me gustó.

translation.en: even when I was being tutored by my uncle.
translation.es: Incluso cuando me enseñaba mi tío.

translation.en: That man likes a pork mustard pie.
translation.es: Adora el pastel de mostaza de cerdo.

translation.en: -You dance well. -Perhaps I have a fine teacher.
translation.es: - Bailas bien. - Quizá tenga un buen maestro.

translation.en: Though his breath has less mustard on it than I'd hoped. [chuckles]
translation.es: Tiene menos aliento a mostaza de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: -[woman] We have an urgent situation. -[knocking continues]
Don't touch the ginger cake. Plays hopscotch with your bowels.
translation.es: No coman el pastel de jengibre. Atrofia los intestinos.

translation.en: I was wondering if we might have a dance this evening.

translation.es: Mi tarjeta de baile está llena.

translation.en: Your last waltz is still free.
I hear he's a good man, and a great reformer.
translation.es: Oí que es un buen hombre y un gran reformista.

translation.en: Well, if you wish to dance with him, you may have to wait.
translation.es: Si deseas bailar con él, quizá debas esperar.

translation.en: Yes, I mustn't lose my chance.
translation.es: Sí, no debo perder mi oportunidad.

translation.en: Forgive me for interrupting. My name is Cicely.
Um, your friend Tabitha suggested we might dance.
translation.es: Su amiga Tabitha sugirió que bailáramos juntos.

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, please take your partners for the last waltz.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, tomen a su pareja para el último vals.

translation.en: You know, I swear I know your face.
but I've seen you looking. Why?
[Enola] Of course. The Paragon Music Hall.
translation.es: Por supuesto, el music hall The Paragon.

translation.en: I saw you talking with a young woman there.
translation.es: Lo vi hablando con una joven allí.

translation.en: Dislocate from me and I will scream.
translation.es: Si se aleja de mí, gritaré.

translation.en: The police are onto you, Mr. Lyon. As it happens, they are onto us both.
translation.es: La policía lo busca. De hecho, nos buscan a los dos.

translation.en: You were not invited here. What do you want?
[Enola] I'm a private detective, hired by Sarah's sister to find her.
translation.es: Soy una detective privada contratada por la hermana de Sarah.

translation.en: If you must persist with this, meet me in the library at midnight.
translation.es: Si insistes en seguir con esto, ve a la biblioteca a medianoche.

translation.en: -My word, you do get in awkward places. -Why are you holding a poker?
translation.es: Siempre en sitios inapropiados. - ¿Por qué tienes un atizador? - Debes irte. Espero a alguien.

translation.en: You must leave. I'm waiting for another.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué tienes un atizador? - Debes irte. Espero a alguien.

translation.en: Another you're scared of such that you need a weapon?
translation.es: ¿Te asusta tanto que tienes un arma?

translation.en: You are always here when I don't want you to be.
And sometimes here when you do.
-What's the matter with you? -Nothing that need concern you.
I like the look of the one you were dancing with. What's her name, Cicely?
translation.es: Me gustó la joven con la que bailabas. ¿Cómo se llama, Cicely?

translation.en: She would make you an excellent wife.
Enola, I am concerned only for you.
Tewkesbury, if you're still here, you may scare him away.
translation.es: Tewkesbury, si te quedas aquí, podrías asustarlo.

translation.en: -"Scare him"? All of this is over a man? -[sighs]
Try to escape, and we will make this difficult.
translation.es: Si intentas huir, será más complicado.

translation.en: Let's make it quiet and spare the fine people any embarrassment.
translation.es: Si vienes callada, evitarás avergonzar a esta noble gente.

translation.en: -Sir, whatever this is about, I'm sure-- -Murder, sir.
translation.es: - De lo sea que se trate… - De homicidio.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, I say. -I knew she didn't belong here.
You danced with young Master Lyon, I hear.
translation.es: Oí que bailó con el joven señor Lyon.

translation.en: May I ask, impertinently, I'm sure,
did you want to kiss him,
or find out more about your case,
translation.es: o averiguar más sobre tu caso?

translation.en: Look, if you're trying to protect her,
There's someone wants to talk to her,
and they're not as kind as me.
translation.es: y no es tan amable como yo.

translation.en: Why were you following me that night?
You were following Mae too, weren't you?
That's why you found the flat.
Who's paying you to kill match girls?
translation.es: ¿Quién le paga por matar a las fosforeras?

translation.en: -I don't know. -She's a thief and a troublemaker.
translation.es: - No lo sé. - Es ladrona y agitadora.

translation.en: You don't want to risk your skin for her.
translation.es: No arriesgues tu vida por ella.

translation.en: Well, if I can't find it out from you, I'll find it out from someone else,
translation.es: Si no me lo dices tú, me lo dirá alguien más,
como su hermana, la pequeña Bessie.

translation.en: Oh, but that's how it starts, Enola Holmes!
translation.es: Pero así es cómo empieza, Enola Holmes.

translation.en: With little girls like her, and you, and Sarah Chapman,
translation.es: Con niñas como ella, tú y Sarah Chapman

translation.en: asking questions, doubting those in charge,
translation.es: que hacen preguntas y dudan de sus superiores.

translation.en: not seeing their protection for what it is,
Well, it only takes one little flame to start a fire,
translation.es: Solo se necesita una pequeña llama para iniciar un incendio

translation.en: and my job is to keep crushing those bloody flames out.
translation.es: y mi trabajo es aplastar esas malditas llamas.

translation.en: Now, I'll be kind and give you one last chance.
translation.es: Seré amable y te daré una última oportunidad.

translation.en: If you can arrange her release,
She is my ward and a minor.
translation.es: Es mi pupila y menor de edad.

translation.en: Any evidence you think you have against her--
translation.es: Las pruebas que crea tener contra ella…

translation.en: She was seen arguing with the victim, following the victim,
translation.es: Se la vio discutir con la víctima, seguir a la víctima,

translation.en: fighting with the victim, and lastly, standing over the victim's dead body.
translation.es: pelear con la víctima y estar junto al cadáver de la víctima.

translation.en: And when we find her there, with blood on her hands,
translation.es: Y cuando la hallamos allí, con sangre en las manos,

translation.en: Marks on and around the door show that it was forced open,
translation.es: Las marcas en la puerta indican que se abrió a la fuerza.

translation.en: There were signs of a scuffle
and boot marks from three separate intruders.
translation.es: y marcas de botas de tres intrusos distintos.

translation.en: judging by the height and extent of the subsequent damage.
translation.es: a juzgar por la altura y el alcance de los daños.

translation.en: Traces of fabric and spots of blood
translation.es: Los rastros de tela y de sangre

translation.en: suggests that there was another occupant, likely female,
translation.es: sugieren que había otra persona, probablemente una mujer,

translation.en: who seems to have fought back,
using a sharp and improvised weapon…
translation.es: con un arma afilada e improvisada…
antes de huir por la ventana.

translation.en: This was a targeted search and interrogation in which two women were discovered,
translation.es: Fue una búsqueda para interrogatorio en la que se hallaron a dos mujeres,

translation.en: and you were curiously fast to arrive after her.
translation.es: Y luego llegó usted sorprendentemente rápido.

translation.en: Now, are you going to release her, or shall I?
translation.es: ¿La liberará usted o me encargo yo?
Coincidencia de huellas dactilares. Un nuevo invento suizo.

translation.en: Makes our work so much more efficient,
translation.es: Hace mucho más eficiente nuestro trabajo,

translation.en: My sister never touched that weapon.
translation.es: Mi hermana nunca tocó esa arma.

translation.en: Then why are her prints on it?
It's a great age we live in, isn't it, Mr. Holmes?
translation.es: Vivimos en una gran época, ¿no, señor Holmes?

translation.en: [woman] Have you any sense what time it is?
-Hello, Edith. -You're lucky, I almost broke your legs.
translation.es: Hola, Edith. Tienes suerte, casi te quiebro las piernas.

translation.en: -You have very recognizable shoulders. -Enola's been arrested.
translation.es: - Tienes hombros muy reconocibles. - Arrestaron a Enola.

translation.en: it may go wider than I thought.
translation.es: mucho más peligroso de lo que creía.

translation.en: And there's something about this case that…
translation.es: Y hay algo sobre este caso que…

translation.en: [Edith] Well, like my mother always said,
"Those who can turn to others when they're in need
translation.es: "Quienes pueden pedir ayuda cuando la necesitan

translation.en: are the truly brave amongst us."
Your mother sounds very different to mine.
translation.es: Tu madre suena muy diferente a la mía.

translation.en: I did try to stop her,
but she's full of this fight.
translation.es: pero está muy comprometida con esta pelea.
No puedes controlar a Enola Holmes.

translation.en: And I fear she will hang.
Oh, it is good to see you.
So this case of yours, how's it going?

translation.es: No sé. Ayudaba a una niña a hallar a su hermana.

translation.en: I was trying to help a girl find her sister, and I've made things worse.
translation.es: No sé. Ayudaba a una niña a hallar a su hermana. - Creo que empeoré todo. - Tonterías.

translation.en: You stirred up a hornet's nest. You are onto something.
translation.es: Causaste un gran revuelo. Vas por buen camino.

translation.en: -Standby! -Why else would they try and silence you?
-[Edith] On your left! -My left or yours?
This match factory, what do you know about it?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabes de esta fábrica de fósforos?

translation.en: In two years, it's doubled its profits.
translation.es: Duplicó sus ganancias en dos años.

translation.en: Yes, the girls are going down with it. They're dying.
translation.es: Sí, las chicas se enferman. Se mueren.

translation.en: Girls like Sarah Chapman, they're expendable.
translation.es: Las chicas como Sarah Chapman son prescindibles.

translation.en: They go missing, too often they die, no one cares.
translation.es: Desaparecen, mueren y a nadie le importa.

translation.en: But this girl, they care about. And greatly.
translation.es: Pero esta chica les importa muchísimo.

translation.en: Aha! So what's she gonna do with them? What's her plan? She's not a thief.
translation.es: ¿Qué hará con ellos? ¿Cuál es su plan? No es ladrona.

translation.en: She's not a blackmailer. She is a troublemaker.
and that is infinitely more dangerous.
translation.es: y eso es infinitamente más peligroso.

translation.en: -Stand by to the right! -Would you mind?
[policeman] Get it out! Get it out of here!
Now, whatever Sarah's hiding, Enola, it's a secret.
translation.es: Enola, lo que sea que Sarah oculta es un secreto.

translation.en: You need to look for what she knows, Enola.
translation.es: Debes buscar lo que ella sabe, Enola.

translation.en: Find that out, and everything else will follow.
translation.es: Averígualo y el resto llegará solo.

translation.en: You all right? You all right?
[Eudoria groans] Good thing I never valued my pelvis.
translation.es: Por suerte nunca valoré mi pelvis.

translation.en: How about you, Edith? -How are the kidneys? -[Edith] Fine.
translation.es: - ¿Y tú, Edith? ¿Qué tal los riñones? - Bien.

translation.en: Hm. You enjoy everything. It's most irritating.
[Edith] Come on, this way. Better get a move on.
So, um, how's that useless boy of yours?
I hear he's doing good work.
Well then, perhaps not so useless after all.
translation.es: Quizá no sea tan inútil después de todo.

translation.en: You know, I sometimes think I brought you up to be too independent.
translation.es: A veces pienso que te crie por demás independiente.

translation.en: -Mother! -[Eudoria] I did it with all of you.
translation.es: - Madre. - Sí. Lo hice con todos.

translation.en: Your purpose must be to find who you are.
translation.es: Tu objetivo debe ser descubrir quién eres.

translation.en: but, well, perhaps a little lonely.
translation.es: Niños fuertes, formidables y singulares, pero quizá algo solitarios.

translation.en: You will do very well on your own, Enola.
translation.es: Te irá muy bien sola, Enola.

translation.en: But with others, you could be magnificent.
translation.es: Pero con otros, podrías ser magnífica.

translation.en: Who do you think organized all of this after all? Hm?
Work with them, and you will become more of who you are.
translation.es: Trabaja con ellos y aflorará aún más quien eres.

translation.en: and you will make more noise than you could ever have imagined.
translation.es: y harán más ruido del que podrías imaginar.

translation.en: Come on. She should go. We'll put them off her scent.
translation.es: Vamos. Debería irse. Los alejaremos de su camino.

translation.en: And if you ever get condemned for murder again, you give me a shout.
translation.es: Y si vuelven a encerrarte por homicidio, avísame.

translation.en: I think my hair is fine.
[Enola] I need you to pack your things.
I need you to be in a safer place.
translation.es: Debes estar en un lugar más seguro.

translation.en: She's got a spare bed now.
There's traces of something in this soil.
translation.es: Hay rastros de algo en la tierra.

translation.en: One has red, and one has white in it.
translation.es: Uno es rojo y el otro es blanco.

translation.en: The matches you make, when did they change from red to white?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo cambiaron de rojo a blanco los fósforos que fabrican?

translation.en: I dunno. Around two years ago.
translation.es: No sé. Hace unos dos años.

translation.en: In two years, he's turned red into black. Or should I say red into white?
translation.es: En dos años, pasó del rojo al negro. O, mejor dicho, del rojo al blanco.

translation.en: [Mr. Lyon] Typhus. The plague of our times.
translation.es: Tifus. La plaga de esta era.

translation.en: Two years it's been killing these girls.
translation.es: Lleva dos años matando a estas chicas.

translation.en: Don't make me repeat it! May I come in?
Firstly, I would like to apologize for so much.
translation.es: Primero, quisiera disculparme por muchas cosas.

translation.en: I have failed to see allies in plain sight.
translation.es: No logré notar aliados a plena vista.

translation.en: There's something I wish to say too.
All day, every day, all I do is compromise.
translation.es: Todo el día, todos los días, lo único que hago es ceder.

translation.en: If I vote for this lord's bill that will allow him to pump bilge water into a lake,
translation.es: Si voto a favor de bombear agua de sentina a un lago,

translation.en: then he will vote for my forestry reform.
I want to stand up and say, "This isn't right," but I have no allies.
translation.es: Quiero decir que no es justo, pero no tengo aliados.

translation.en: So to do so would be to risk all that is good,
translation.es: Si lo hago, arriesgaría todo mi buen trabajo.

translation.en: so I lie awake trying to work out which path to follow,
translation.es: Me desvelo e intento pensar qué camino seguir.

translation.en: There is no search for a wife,

translation.es: porque la política me consume constantemente.

translation.en: That is the speech I stored up for you.
translation.es: Ese es el discurso que tenía para ti.

translation.en: But I understand your struggle, because I struggle too.
translation.es: Pero entiendo tu lucha porque yo también lucho.

translation.en: I am sorry we cannot talk more, because I have-- A case to solve?
translation.es: - Lamento no poder hablar más, pero tengo… - ¿Un caso que resolver?

translation.en: The girl I'm looking for, Sarah Chapman,
translation.es: La chica que busco, Sarah Chapman,

translation.en: she has proof that girls are dying from the phosphorus they work with every day.
translation.es: tiene pruebas de que las chicas mueren por el fósforo de su trabajo.

translation.en: And the factory are trying to cover it up as typhus.
translation.es: Y la fábrica intenta cubrirlo haciéndolo pasar por tifus.

translation.en: and someone is going to kill her for it.
translation.es: y alguien la va a matar por eso.

translation.en: -Don't open it. it could be the police. -You're still wanted by the police?
translation.es: No abras. Podría ser la policía. - ¿Aún te buscan? - Claro. Hui de prisión.
- ¿Aún te buscan? - Claro. Hui de prisión. - ¿Qué? - Olvida que te dije eso.

translation.en: The lights are on. If I don't answer, they'll suspect more. Hide.
translation.es: No apagues las luces. Sospecharán si no abro. Ocúltate.

translation.en: -Miss Cicely. -[Cicely] I'm sorry it's so late.
No, no, not at all. I-I told you to come. I-I want to help.
translation.es: No. No, para nada. Le dije que viniera. Quiero ayudar.

translation.en: Better we are alone, for it is imperative that I speak with you.
translation.es: Bien. Mejor así, porque es imperativo que hable con usted.

translation.en: Sir, I feel that you're a man of great character and that I can trust you.
translation.es: Creo que es un hombre de gran carácter en quien puedo confiar.

translation.en: Which is why I fear I may have to unburden myself, and it may prove shocking.
translation.es: Por eso temo tener que desahogarme y podría ser impactante.

translation.en: It's just, I've been wanting to speak with you about… a relationship.
translation.es: Srta. Cicely, quizá podríamos… Quería hablar con usted sobre una relación.

translation.en: Oh, that. Yes. Uh, perhaps we can discuss this another time?
translation.es: Sí. Quizás podríamos hablarlo en otro momento.

translation.en: I'm terribly sorry. Let me assure you, I do share your interest.
translation.es: - Por favor. - Lo siento mucho. Le aseguro que comparto su interés

translation.en: Do not think of doubting me. Cicely was here for my help.
translation.es: No dudes de mí. Cicely necesitaba mi ayuda.

translation.en: She told me at the ball that she's working on a bill to change factory law.
translation.es: Dijo que trabaja en un proyecto para cambiar la ley de fábricas.

translation.en: She's unearthed something, some corruption or other.
translation.es: Descubrió algo, una especie de corrupción.

translation.en: Enola, if you have any concerns, I tell you categorically, I…
translation.es: Enola, si tienes alguna inquietud, te aseguro categóricamente que solo tengo ojos para…

translation.en: I have no eyes for anyone, but…
translation.es: te aseguro categóricamente que solo tengo ojos para…

translation.en: Well, no, this is not quite how I wanted to say that.
But to say, in terms of romantic interests,
translation.es: Pero, en términos de intereses románticos,

translation.en: The reason I don't have to search, I'm busy with politics, like I said…
translation.es: No busco esposa porque me consume la política.

translation.en: I hear he is a good man and a great reformer.
translation.es: Oí que es buen hombre y un gran reformista.

translation.en: The woman I would be most interested in--
translation.es: La mujer que más me interesaría…

translation.en: You got five seconds to tell me why you're here.
translation.es: Tienes un segundo para decirme qué haces aquí.

translation.en: The phosphorus in the match-making has mixed with oxygen.
Enola, did you understand what I said?
Or rather what I didn't say? Did you understand… what I didn't say?
translation.es: O más bien, lo que no dije. ¿Entendiste lo que no dije?

translation.en: Yes. You were saying that you…
That message you sent me with the fan at the ball,
translation.es: En el baile, me enviaste un mensaje con el abanico.

translation.en: [McIntyre] Ladies and gentlemen, to the future.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, por el futuro.

translation.en: They were working together, in love.
To expose the corruption in that factory and stop what his father was doing.
translation.es: para exponer la corrupción en esa fábrica y detener lo que hacía su padre.

translation.en: William Lyon invited you to that ball.
translation.es: William Lyon te invitó a ese baile.

translation.en: He's a radical just like you.
They needed my help. You're right.
But, Enola, we must return inside.
The police are pursuing you, and we have much to talk of.
translation.es: La policía te busca y debemos hablar.

translation.en: No! I know we have much to talk of, my dear, dear lord.
translation.es: No. Sé que debemos hablar, querido lord.

translation.en: And as it turns out, I love you too.
translation.es: Y resulta que yo también te amo.

translation.en: -[Enola] Shh. You're walking loudly. -[Tewkesbury] But it's gravel.
translation.es: - Haces mucho ruido al caminar. - Es la grava.

translation.en: -[Enola] You've got large feet. -[Tewkesbury] I know.
[grunts] Wait here. Keep guard. If anyone comes, just tell them you're a lord.
translation.es: Espera aquí. Mantén guardia. Si te ven, di que eres un lord.

translation.en: I told you to stay safe and stay away.
translation.es: Te dije que te mantuvieras a salvo.

translation.en: Now you're breaking out of prison and have the police after you.
translation.es: Huiste de prisión y te busca toda la policía.

translation.en: Oh. Are you hurt? I am sorry.
I wonder who taught you to fight like that.
translation.es: ¿Quién te habrá enseñado a pelear así?

translation.en: Another thing our mother has to answer for. She should have fed me as well as you is what I think.
translation.es: - Otra cosa que reprocharle a mamá. - Debería haberme alimentado como a ti.

translation.en: Hang on. Why are you here? Is it my case, or your own?
translation.es: Espera. ¿Por qué viniste? ¿Por mi caso o el tuyo?

translation.en: Both. I know how Grail got your fingerprints.
translation.es: Por ambos. Sé cómo Grail obtuvo tus huellas.

translation.en: lifted from the table and applied to the knife.
translation.es: que él pasó de la mesa al cuchillo.

translation.en: It seems our cases are connected.
And my thief in a taper crown hat.
Stay unemotional. There's nothing more we can do for him now.
translation.es: Mantén la compostura. Ya no podemos hacer nada por él.

translation.en: Need to keep our minds fresh and our eyes sharp.
translation.es: Debemos mantener la mente y los ojos alertas.

translation.en: -[Sherlock] Yes, and searched. -[Enola] For the document he took?
translation.es: - Y lo revisaron. - Por el documento que se llevó.

translation.en: and scratch marks from a cane that has a metal ferrule.
translation.es: y rayas de un bastón con virola de metal.

translation.en: There was another in this room. This cigar had a holder.
translation.es: - Había alguien más aquí. - Este cigarro tenía boquilla.

translation.en: [Mr. Lyon] Well, Lord McIntyre, if I, um, might suggest a little lunch.
translation.es: Bueno, lord McIntyre, ¿qué le parece si almorzamos?

translation.en: [William] Leave me be, please. They're watching.
translation.es: Déjame en paz, por favor. Nos observan.

translation.en: The office of Lord McIntyre, Treasury Minister.
translation.es: Lord McIntyre es el ministro del Tesoro.

translation.en: How did you come to that?
I think what William stole was proof that Lyon and McIntyre were conspiring together.
translation.es: Creo que lo que robó William fue la prueba de que Lyon y McIntyre conspiraban juntos.

translation.en: McIntyre has been secretly profiting from the factory.
translation.es: McIntyre se ha beneficiado de la fábrica en secreto.

translation.en: They changed the match formula to a cheaper phosphorus,
translation.es: Cambiaron la fórmula a un fósforo que es más barato

translation.en: Enola, I was concerned for you.
You left me out there in the dark, and I nearly tore my…
translation.es: Me dejaste en la oscuridad y casi rompo mi…
- Todo encaja. - Nadie se sentó aquí.

translation.en: No one has sat in this chair. No marks on the carpet, no indentation.
translation.es: - Todo encaja. - Nadie se sentó aquí. No hay marcas en la alfombra ni hendidura. Fumaron el cigarro, pero está frío.

translation.en: The cigar has been smoked, but cold.
translation.es: No hay marcas en la alfombra ni hendidura. Fumaron el cigarro, pero está frío.

translation.en: -No lips have touched that glass. -[Sherlock] Exactly.
translation.es: - Nadie bebió de ese vaso. - Exacto.

translation.en: These clues have been planted for us to find,
translation.es: Estas pistas no son más que un cebo

translation.en: to mislead us from the true villain.
Not McIntyre, but by someone who had a lot to lose without that document.
translation.es: No fue McIntyre, sino alguien que perdería mucho sin ese documento.

translation.en: Someone who knew what they were up to and was blackmailing them.
translation.es: Alguien que sabía lo que tramaban y los chantajeaba.
Alguien a quien le gusta jugar.

translation.en: -Did they get what they wanted? -[Sherlock] No, I don't think so.
translation.es: - ¿Obtuvo lo que quería? - No lo creo.

translation.en: -[Enola] They did get something. -[Sherlock] Mae's terrible music.
translation.es: - Sí obtuvo algo. - La terrible canción para Mae.

translation.en: The Gods is the top row of the theater.
translation.es: Los dioses son la fila superior del teatro.

translation.en: Just to be clear as to what we might be about to face…
translation.es: Para aclarar a qué nos podríamos enfrentar…

translation.en: There may be some violence. You've faced it before.
translation.es: Podría haber violencia. Nada nuevo para ti.

translation.en: I did have part of a suit of armor on.
-You've been in a fight before? -Yes, plenty of fights. Fenced for my school.
translation.es: - Ya peleaste, ¿no? - Sí, claro. Con amigos de mi escuela.

translation.en: Fine. Can you teach me to fight?
What, right now? In a carriage?
Did I not teach you to dance in five minutes in a bathroom?
translation.es: ¿No te enseñé a bailar en cinco minutos en un baño?

translation.en: There are two secrets to fighting. Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
translation.es: Hay dos secretos para pelear. Evita el golpe, da el golpe.

translation.en: I don't see how two secrets-- Ow!
Your second. You didn't avoid the punch.
translation.es: Tu segunda. No evitaste el golpe.

translation.en: -You can hardly expect me to hit a girl. -Oh dear.
translation.es: - No puedes esperar que pegue a una chica. - Cielos.

translation.en: I may need more of those lessons.
[Enola] The contract between Lyon and McIntyre
translation.es: El contrato entre Lyon y McIntyre
Lo que William robó por ti.

translation.en: And the pages from the factory register.
translation.es: Y las páginas del registro de la fábrica.

translation.en: That's what you stole from the office.
These are the names of the girls they killed. [Sarah] I couldn't let 'em be forgotten.
translation.es: - Los nombres de las chicas que mataron. - No podían quedar en el olvido.

translation.en: And it's proof that match girls are dying from working in that factory,
translation.es: Y es prueba de que las fosforeras mueren por trabajar en esa fábrica

translation.en: and they knew it all along.
You're a bloody good detective, Enola Holmes.
translation.es: Eres muy buena detective, Enola Holmes.

translation.en: I will share this with the world, I promise you.
translation.es: Todo el mundo lo sabrá. Te lo prometo.

translation.en: Now we must find William. He was supposed to meet me six hours ago.
translation.es: Debemos hallar a William. Debía verme hace horas.

translation.en: I'm afraid William won't be coming.
translation.es: Me temo que William no vendrá.

translation.en: I told him we had everything we needed.
translation.es: Le dije que teníamos lo que necesitábamos.

translation.en: That we should just go public.
He said nobody would care unless we had someone in power who would listen.
translation.es: Dijo que a nadie le importaría sin la ayuda de alguien con poder.

translation.en: He was just trying to keep me safe.
We must move quickly, or we'll lose you too.
translation.es: Apresurémonos o te perderemos a ti.

translation.en: Give me the papers and I will.
translation.es: Dame los papeles y la soltaré.

translation.en: -[Sherlock] Don't just stand there! -[tense music continues]
Avoid the punch, make the counterpunch.
translation.es: Evita el golpe, da el golpe.

translation.en: -[Enola gasps] -[Mae] You got more to you than I thought.
translation.es: Eres mejor de lo que pensé.

translation.en: What places we find ourselves in.
I used to dream I'd end up on the stage. [chuckles]
translation.es: Solía soñar que terminaría en el escenario.

translation.en: You're not rid of me yet,
translation.es: Aún no te libraste de mí,

translation.en: [Enola] Lord McIntyre. What are you doing here?
Your brother knew that I would want to see the right people shown justice.
translation.es: Tu hermano sabía que quería atrapar a los criminales.

translation.en: And I don't know how to thank you for retrieving this government property
translation.es: No sé cómo agradecerte por recuperar esta propiedad del gobierno

translation.en: and, uh, bringing this killer to light.
The world shall know the name Enola Holmes,
translation.es: El mundo entero conocerá el nombre de Enola Holmes.

translation.en: -Theft. -All she stole from you was the truth.
translation.es: Por robo. Lo único que le robó fue la verdad.

translation.en: which she used for extortion and blackmail.
translation.es: que usó para extorsionarme y chantajearme.

translation.en: Which is why she will serve her time.
I summoned you here to draw that very person out.
translation.es: Lo llamé aquí para atraer a esa persona.

translation.en: A tangle of roots, but all pointed to one pocket.
translation.es: Una maraña de raíces, pero todas apuntaban a un único bolsillo.

translation.en: One person receiving the fruits of their schemes
translation.es: Una persona que recibía los frutos de su plan
Alguien que oía todo y veía todo.

translation.en: And it's fun, once you know the rules.
translation.es: Y es divertido si conoces las reglas.

translation.en: [Miss Troy] It's remarkable what can be done
translation.es: Es… increíble lo que se puede hacer
increíble lo que se puede hacer cuando la gente te subestima.

translation.en: He threatened to cut off your money train.
You hired Grail to retrieve the document,
translation.es: Contrataste a Grail para recuperar el documento,

translation.en: but things got out of hand,
translation.es: pero las cosas se te fueron de las manos

translation.en: so you tried to point us to Lord McIntyre.
translation.es: e intentaste inculpar a lord McIntyre.

translation.en: A rare misstep in your game…
translation.es: Un raro paso en falso en tu juego…

translation.en: Such a shame our divertissement has to end, Mr. Holmes.
translation.es: Es una pena que nuestro entretenimiento tenga que terminar, señor Holmes.

translation.en: Miss Troy, you have been behind this?
Of course, you never can find the proper staff.
translation.es: Por supuesto, nunca se puede hallar personal adecuado.

translation.en: I only wanted the agreements back.
Though I couldn't be seen to question William myself, you were so obliging.
translation.es: No podían verme interrogar a William, pero tú fuiste tan amable en hacerlo.

translation.en: If you wish to speak with William, you could always try with that.
translation.es: Si quieres hablar con William, puedes intentar con eso.

translation.en: [Miss Troy] Just a pity he was smarter and braver in the end than I'd expected.
translation.es: Es una pena que él haya sido más astuto y valiente de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: They both were. Their deaths were so unnecessary.
translation.es: Los dos. Sus muertes fueron muy innecesarias.

translation.en: But Superintendent Grail was somewhat of a blunt instrument.
translation.es: Pero el superintendente Grail era una herramienta despiadada.

translation.en: How dare you take advantage of your position!
translation.es: ¿Cómo te atreves a sacar ventaja de tu posición?

translation.en: Treated like a common servant when I have twice the mind of yours.
translation.es: Me trataste como sirvienta cuando soy mucho más astuta que tú.

translation.en: Why shouldn't I have a share of your ill-begotten riches
translation.es: ¿Por qué no debería tomar parte de tus riquezas ilícitas

translation.en: and punish you at the same time?
Why shouldn't I be rewarded for what I can do?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no debería ser recompensada por lo que puedo hacer?

translation.en: Where is my place in this… society?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es mi sitio en esta sociedad?

translation.en: I cannot own shares, I cannot advance myself as they can.
translation.es: no puedo tener acciones, no puedo avanzar como ellos.

translation.en: Such a shame our little dance has to end.
translation.es: Es una pena que nuestro bailecito deba terminar.

translation.en: Perhaps we shall take to the floor again.
I accidentally burnt my own property. What of it?
translation.es: Quemé mis documentos por accidente. No tiene nada de malo.

translation.en: And complicit in the deaths of hundreds of match girls.
translation.es: Y cómplice de la muerte de cientos de fosforeras.
Todos esos nombres, todas esas vidas…

translation.en: and they're gonna get away with it.
translation.es: y se saldrán con la suya.

translation.en: You heard the man. "Where's your proof?"
You're late, Bess Chapman. Docking you a penny.
translation.es: Llegas tarde, Bess Chapman. Te descontaré un centavo.

translation.en: You're not welcome here no more.
Mae Izley, William Lyon, and I
translation.es: Mae Izley, William Lyon y yo

translation.en: To prove that this factory was killing people,
translation.es: Que esta fábrica estaba matando gente

translation.en: But they decided that profit mattered more than we did.
translation.es: Pero las ganancias les importaban más que nosotras.

translation.en: It ain't typhus that's killing us. It's the phosphorus.
translation.es: No es el tifus lo que nos mata, es el fósforo.

translation.en: What we work with every day.
translation.es: Con lo que trabajamos a diario.

translation.en: That's a penny off your wages!
It's time for us to use the only thing we have. Ourselves.
translation.es: Es hora de usar lo único que tenemos: nosotras mismas.

translation.en: It's time for us to refuse to work.
translation.es: Es hora de negarnos a trabajar.
Es hora de decirles que no.

translation.en: You leave here, there is no coming back.
translation.es: Si se van, no habrá vuelta atrás.

translation.en: You will not get employed here again.
It is not worth the risk.
translation.es: No vale la pena correr este riesgo.

translation.en: [Crouch] This is how the world works.
I know you're scared. I am too.
translation.es: Sé que tienen miedo, yo también,

translation.en: But it's the only power we have!
translation.es: pero es el único poder que tenemos.

translation.en: get that machine back on and get back to work.
translation.es: Enciendan esa máquina y vuelvan a trabajar.
Este no puede ser su futuro.

translation.en: Can't anyone control these bloody women?
That's a whole lot of noise.
She likes causing trouble, doesn't she?
It's as if she was molded that way.
translation.es: Es como si la hubieran criado así.

translation.en: Seems your boy has learned how to fight.
translation.es: Parece que tu chico aprendió a pelear.

translation.en: And what will people pay you in? Potatoes and gratitude?
translation.es: ¿Y con qué te pagarán? ¿Papas y gratitud?

translation.en: You can deal with the hoits and toits. This is where I should be.
translation.es: Tú te encargarás de los ricos. Yo pertenezco aquí.

translation.en: Edith said she'll be kind with the rent.
translation.es: Edith dijo que no cobraría mucho de renta.

translation.en: You know, you are aware, should you wish some finer surrounds, I could, uh…
translation.es: Sabes que si deseas un sitio de mayor elegancia, podría…

translation.en: But if I did that, I would always be in your shadow.
translation.es: Pero si lo hiciera, siempre me opacarías.

translation.en: Though I do like this new version of you.
translation.es: Pero me gusta esta nueva versión de ti.

translation.en: No one should be alone all the time.
A friend would do you well.
Perhaps I should write that down.
I shall drop by to check on you.
Perhaps you could come to Baker Street from time to time…
translation.es: Quizá podrías venir a Baker Street de vez en cuando…

translation.en: Perhaps we can fix on Thursday, 4 p.m.
translation.es: Quizá podamos vernos el jueves a las 4:00 p. m.
El jueves a las 4:00 p. m.

translation.en: It seems I shan't be the last to interrupt you today.
translation.es: Parece que no seré el último en interrumpirte hoy.

translation.en: [Enola] Tewkesbury, when did I give you the impression that I like flowers?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo di la impresión de que me gustan las flores?

translation.en: They're called Spreading Bellflowers. Wild, of course.
Attracted to ancient woodland, wiry, deceptive,
translation.es: Les atrae el bosque antiguo, son ásperas, engañosas,

translation.en: refuse to behave according to any rules,
translation.es: se niegan a seguir las reglas,

translation.en: but their petals are so delicate, and their flowers--
translation.es: pero sus pétalos son muy delicados y sus flores…

translation.en: Your metaphor is tortured, and I don't have delicate petals.
translation.es: Tu metáfora es una tortura y no tengo pétalos delicados.

translation.en: It is an invitation to a ball being given by--
translation.es: Una invitación a un baile que organiza…

translation.en: Uh, I am not going to a ball with you. I got arrested at the last one.
translation.es: No iré a un baile contigo. Me arrestaron en el último.

translation.en: Well, all the more reason to dance again, wouldn't you say?
translation.es: Más razón para volver a bailar, ¿no crees?

translation.en: -[Enola] You're a nincompoop. -[Tewkesbury] And you are a coward.
translation.es: - Eres un tonto. - Y tú eres una cobarde.

translation.en: [Enola] How dare you speak to a lady like that? You are a disgrace, sir.
translation.es: ¿Cómo le habla así a una dama? Qué vergüenza, señor.

translation.en: [Tewkesbury] And yet you still hold my arm.
translation.es: Y aun así me tomas del brazo.

translation.en: [Enola] And yet I still hold your arm.
translation.es: Y aun así te tomo del brazo.

translation.en: The young lady was very clear as to the place a-and the time.
translation.es: La jovencita fue muy clara en cuanto al lugar y la hora.
